title: Ravel Cord
definition: A smooth, strong cord used in machine knitting to separate sections of knitted fabric easily.
example: Simillar to a provisional cast on in hand knitting, this can leave "live" stitches to work later.

schemaMarkup.name: Ravel Cord
schemaMarkup.description: A smooth, strong cord for use in many techniques to separate sections of knitted fabric or cast on and remove waste yarn cleanly.
